press_button.description: Press the mouse button to register a click.

rotate_wheel_up.description: Rotate the mouse wheel upwards to scroll upward.

rotate_wheel_down.description: Rotate the mouse wheel downwards to scroll downward.

cleanse_mouse_body.description: Wipe the mouse body to clean it.

general_mouse_cleanse.description: Cleanse the entire mouse, including button, wheel, and body.

interactive_testing.description: Interact with the mouse by pressing the button and rotating the wheel.
